title: DTF:HN for January 31, 2026
description:
Your Daily Tech Feed covering the top 9 stories on Hacker News for January 31, 2026. Featuring: Antirender: remove the glossy shine on architectural renderings, Euro firms must ditch Uncle Sam's clouds and go EU-native, Sumerian Star Map Recorded the Impact of an Asteroid (2024), We have ipinfo at home or how to geolocate IPs in your CLI using latency, Show HN: I trained a 9M speech model to fix my Mandarin tones, and more.

Stories covered:
1. Antirender: remove the glossy shine on architectural renderings
   https://antirender.com/
   HN discussion: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46829147

2. Euro firms must ditch Uncle Sam's clouds and go EU-native
   https://www.theregister.com/2026/01/30/euro_firms_must_ditch_us/
   HN discussion: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46835336

3. Sumerian Star Map Recorded the Impact of an Asteroid (2024)
   https://archaeologyworlds.com/5500-year-old-sumerian-star-map-recorded/
   HN discussion: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46834313

4. We have ipinfo at home or how to geolocate IPs in your CLI using latency
   https://blog.globalping.io/we-have-ipinfo-at-home-or-how-to-geolocate-ips-in-your-cli-using-latency/
   HN discussion: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46834953

5. Show HN: I trained a 9M speech model to fix my Mandarin tones
   https://simedw.com/2026/01/31/ear-pronunication-via-ctc/
   HN discussion: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46832074

6. A Step Behind the Bleeding Edge: A Philosophy on AI in Dev
   https://somehowmanage.com/2026/01/22/a-step-behind-the-bleeding-edge-monarchs-philosophy-on-ai-in-dev/
   HN discussion: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46809846

7. Direct Current Data Centers
   https://terraformindustries.wordpress.com/2026/01/30/direct-current-data-centers/
   HN discussion: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46831736

8. Peerweb: Decentralized website hosting via WebTorrent
   https://peerweb.lol/
   HN discussion: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46829582

9. My Ridiculously Robust Photo Management System (Immich Edition)
   https://jaisenmathai.com/articles/my-ridiculously-robust-photo-management-system-immich-edition/
   HN discussion: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46794971

title: DTF:HN for January 30, 2026
description:
Your Daily Tech Feed covering the top 10 stories on Hacker News for January 30, 2026. Featuring: Moltbook, Code is cheap. Show me the talk, Wisconsin communities signed secrecy deals for billion-dollar data centers, Tesla’s autonomous vehicles are crashing at a rate much higher tha human drivers, OpenClaw – Moltbot Renamed Again, and more.

Stories covered:
1. Moltbook
   https://www.moltbook.com/
   HN discussion: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46820360

2. Code is cheap. Show me the talk
   https://nadh.in/blog/code-is-cheap/
   HN discussion: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46823485

3. Wisconsin communities signed secrecy deals for billion-dollar data centers
   https://www.wpr.org/news/4-wisconsin-communities-signed-secrecy-deals-billion-dollar-data-centers
   HN discussion: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46824098

4. Tesla’s autonomous vehicles are crashing at a rate much higher tha human drivers
   https://electrek.co/2026/01/29/teslas-own-robotaxi-data-confirms-crash-rate-3x-worse-than-humans-even-with-monitor/
   HN discussion: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46822632

5. OpenClaw – Moltbot Renamed Again
   https://openclaw.ai/blog/introducing-openclaw
   HN discussion: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46820783

6. Show HN: Amla Sandbox – WASM bash shell sandbox for AI agents
   https://github.com/amlalabs/amla-sandbox
   HN discussion: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46824877

7. Implementing a tiny CPU rasterizer (2024)
   https://lisyarus.github.io/blog/posts/implementing-a-tiny-cpu-rasterizer-part-1.html
   HN discussion: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46759358

8. Richard Feynman Side Hustles
   https://twitter.com/carl_feynman/status/2016979540099420428
   HN discussion: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46824867

9. The Engineer who invented the Mars Rover Suspension in his garage [video]
   https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QKSPk_0N4Jc
   HN discussion: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46773655

10. Track Your Routine – Open-source app for task management
   https://github.com/MSF01/TYR
   HN discussion: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46823358

title: DTF:HN for January 29, 2026
description:
Your Daily Tech Feed covering the top 10 stories on Hacker News for January 29, 2026. Featuring: Project Genie: Experimenting with infinite, interactive worlds, PlayStation 2 Recompilation Project Is Absolutely Incredible, Claude Code daily benchmarks for degradation tracking, Drug trio found to block tumour resistance in pancreatic cancer, Compressed Agents.md > Agent Skills, and more.

Stories covered:
1. Project Genie: Experimenting with infinite, interactive worlds
   https://blog.google/innovation-and-ai/models-and-research/google-deepmind/project-genie/
   HN discussion: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46812933

2. PlayStation 2 Recompilation Project Is Absolutely Incredible
   https://redgamingtech.com/playstation-2-recompilation-project-is-absolutely-incredible/
   HN discussion: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46814743

3. Claude Code daily benchmarks for degradation tracking
   https://marginlab.ai/trackers/claude-code/
   HN discussion: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46810282

4. Drug trio found to block tumour resistance in pancreatic cancer
   https://www.drugtargetreview.com/news/192714/drug-trio-found-to-block-tumour-resistance-in-pancreatic-cancer/
   HN discussion: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46812159

5. Compressed Agents.md > Agent Skills
   https://vercel.com/blog/agents-md-outperforms-skills-in-our-agent-evals
   HN discussion: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46809708

6. Flameshot
   https://github.com/flameshot-org/flameshot
   HN discussion: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46815297

7. Retiring GPT-4o, GPT-4.1, GPT-4.1 mini, and OpenAI o4-mini in ChatGPT
   https://openai.com/index/retiring-gpt-4o-and-older-models/
   HN discussion: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46816539

8. Launch HN: AgentMail (YC S25) – An API that gives agents their own email inboxes
   HN discussion: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46812608

9. Europe’s next-generation weather satellite sends back first images
   https://www.esa.int/Applications/Observing_the_Earth/Meteorological_missions/meteosat_third_generation/Europe_s_next-generation_weather_satellite_sends_back_first_images
   HN discussion: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46806773

10. The Value of Things
   https://journal.stuffwithstuff.com/2026/01/24/the-value-of-things/
   HN discussion: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46752754
